Coronavirus Letter.pdf
Our school district is working closely with Pierce County Public Health Department. They have provided the following numbers for the general public to call if they have questions or concerns about the Coronovirus:
In Wisconsin, please call 211 if you have questions for the health department.
For Minnesota based cell phones (those without a 715 area code) please call 1-877-947-2211.
